title: CS101
description: CS101 is a fast-paced series that simplifies key computer science and technology concepts in short videos all under 100 seconds. Covering topics like binary, programming languages, CPUs, Docker, and Linux, it offers clear and concise lessons for both beginners and experienced developers, making complex topics easy to grasp.

episodes.title: Binary Explained in 01100100 Seconds
episodes.description: Binary is a base-2 numbering system and the final language used by computer hardware. Programmers don't write binary code directly, but it's import to understand how a machine uses transistors to organize billions of bits to represent data. https://fireship.io

episodes.title: C in 100 Seconds
episodes.description: The C Programming Language is quite possibly the most influential language of all time. It powers OS kernels like Linux, Windows, and Mac and many other low-level systems.  Its syntax has inspired many other languages, including Cpp, Csharp, Java, JavaScript, Go, Perl, and more.

episodes.title: Bash in 100 Seconds
episodes.description: Bash is the command line shell that you encounter when you open the terminal on most Unix operating systems, like MacOS and Linux. Learn how to create your own bash scripts to automate tasks on your computer.

episodes.title: Why do computers suck at math?
episodes.description: What is a floating point number? And why does it produce rounding errors for programmers?

episodes.title: How a CPU Works in 100 Seconds // Apple Silicon M1 vs Intel i9
episodes.description: Learn how the central processing unit (CPU) works in your computer. Compare performance and processor architecture between the Intel and Apple Silicon M1 chips with @AZisk

episodes.title: 7 Fancy Programming Words
episodes.description: Learn the meaning of 7 fancy, yet important, programming terms before your next technical interview https://fireship.io

episodes.title: 7 Database Paradigms
episodes.description: Learn about seven different database paradigms and what they do best. https://fireship.io/lessons/top-seven-database-paradigms/

episodes.title: Binary Search Algorithm in 100 Seconds
episodes.description: Binary Search is an algorithm that can find the index of an element in a sorted array data structure. You've likely used Binary Search it in everyday life without even realizing it.

episodes.title: 100+ Computer Science Concepts Explained
episodes.description: Learn the fundamentals of Computer Science with a quick breakdown of jargon that every software engineer should know. Over 100 technical concepts from the CS curriculum are explained to provide a foundation for programmers.

episodes.title: 100+ Web Development Things you Should Know
episodes.description: WebDev 101 is a complete introduction into the world of web development. Learn the basic concepts and skills required to build fullstack web apps with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

episodes.title: 100+ JavaScript Concepts you Need to Know
episodes.description: The ultimate 10 minute JavaScript course that quickly breaks down over 100 key concepts every web developer should know. Learn the basics of JS and start building apps on the web, mobile, desktop, and more.

episodes.title: CPU vs GPU vs TPU vs DPU vs QPU
